frameset.edef: to hold a belief without a doubt

example.parse: (CONJ و) (S-PRP (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_INDEF_ACC يَقِيناً) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP فِي) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN القِصاص)) (PP-LOC (PREP فِي) (NP (NOUN بَلَد) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ صَعْب)) (PP-PRP (PREP بِ) (NP (NOUN سَبَب) (NP (NOUN غِياب) (NP (DET+NOUN الضَمائِر))))))))))))))))))

arg.g: that retribution in our country is impossible since we have no conscience

example.arg: فِي إِنّ القِصاص فِي بَلَدنا صَعْب بِسَبَب غِياب الضَمائِر
